name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Platform Engineer with 8+ years of expertise, I excel in designing and implementing robust, scalable cloud-based solutions utilizing **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Proficient in modern programming languages including **Java** and **C#**, I leverage my experience in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **MySQL** along with **NoSQL** database systems to create high-performance applications. I have a strong emphasis on **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, **CI/CD** pipelines using **GitLab CI** and **Jenkins**, and observability tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **New Relic** to ensure operational excellence. My capabilities also extend to utilizing design patterns and **OOP** principles, along with a solid understanding of message queues and testing strategies. By fostering effective leadership and communication, I am committed to delivering innovative solutions while enhancing team collaboration and problem-solving initiatives.
